mods.abstract: Two color window card (green and yellow on white) announcing the Porchlight Sessions documentary and features interviews with Ralph Stanley, Doc Watson, Bobby Osborne, Jerry Douglas, Vince Gill, and others. Film celebrates the evolution of hillbilly sound as it became a genre following the legacy of Bill Monroe.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
